categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Mission to recover Imperial communication logs

The rebel agent Luke Skywalker was sent on a mission to recover Imperial communication logs following the mission to Giju, but he was ambushed in the Tertiary Usaita system, forcing him to postpone his mission and return to Devaron to repair his ship, Y 4.
The mission first appeared in the 2015 canon young readers novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, written by Jason Fry.
